author: Todd Haselton
title: Here are two cool iPhone camera tricks you're probably not even using
description: Use burst mode and camera effects to bring life to iPhone pictures and make your photos a lot more fun.
content:
Another trick is to always swipe up when you're going through your pictures. Apple lets you do a lot of fun things with your pictures, including turning them into a loop, which is particularly fun when goofing off with friends. Your phone will save it as a GIF.

Note: this only works with Live photos, so make sure you're not using portrait mode.

To do this:

Take a picture on your iPhone.

Open the picture you just shot.

Slide up on the iPhone screen with your finger.

Under effects, select the one you want, like Live, Loop, Bounce or Long Exposure.
